name: CMGT_EXT_DATA_FraudulentTransactions_CaseStudioFields
description: Data rule for Fraudulent Transactions studio fields
sail_code:
a!match(
  value: ri!title,
  equals: "Incorrect Amount Charged",
  then: a!map(
    caseType: recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions Credit Card Disputes (DEMO)(
      recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions Credit Card Disputes (DEMO).friendlyId: ri!friendlyId,
      recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions Credit Card Disputes (DEMO).cardNetworkId: 1,
      recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions Credit Card Disputes (DEMO).last4DigitsCardNumber: "3167",
      
    ),
    category: recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions (DEMO)(
      recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions (DEMO).friendlyId:ri!friendlyId,
      recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions (DEMO).amountExpectedToPay: 400000,
      recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions (DEMO).merchantName: "Home Furnish Depot",
      recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions (DEMO).transactionAmount: 300000,
      recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions (DEMO).transactionDate: rule!CMGT_EXT_UTIL_RandomDateTime(
        fromDate: a!subtractDateTime(startDateTime: now(), months: 2),
        toDate: now()
      )
    )
  ),
  equals: "Duplicate Transaction",
  then: a!map(
    caseType: recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions Credit Card Disputes (DEMO)(
      recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions Credit Card Disputes (DEMO).friendlyId: ri!friendlyId,
      recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions Credit Card Disputes (DEMO).cardNetworkId: 3,
      recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions Credit Card Disputes (DEMO).last4DigitsCardNumber: "6665",

    ),
    category: recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions (DEMO)(
      recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions (DEMO).friendlyId:ri!friendlyId,
      recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions (DEMO).amountExpectedToPay: 200000,
      recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions (DEMO).merchantName: "Prime Electronics",
      recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions (DEMO).transactionAmount: 400000,
      recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions (DEMO).transactionDate: rule!CMGT_EXT_UTIL_RandomDateTime(
        fromDate: a!subtractDateTime(startDateTime: now(), months: 2),
        toDate: now()
      )
    )
  ),
  equals: "ACH Payment Not Received",
  then: a!map(
    caseType: recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions Automated Clearing House (DEMO)(
      recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions Automated Clearing House (DEMO).friendlyId: ri!friendlyId,
      recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions Automated Clearing House (DEMO).typeOfAccountId: 1,
      recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions Automated Clearing House (DEMO).bankRoutingNumber: "081211135",

    ),
    category: recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions (DEMO)(
      recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions (DEMO).friendlyId:ri!friendlyId,
      recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions (DEMO).amountExpectedToPay: 300000,
      recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions (DEMO).merchantName: "Urban Apparel",
      recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions (DEMO).transactionAmount: 300000,
      recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions (DEMO).transactionDate: rule!CMGT_EXT_UTIL_RandomDateTime(
        fromDate: a!subtractDateTime(startDateTime: now(), months: 2),
        toDate: now()
      )
    )
  ),
  equals: "ACH Transaction Error",
  then:a!map(
    caseType: recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions Automated Clearing House (DEMO)(
      recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions Automated Clearing House (DEMO).friendlyId: ri!friendlyId,
      recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions Automated Clearing House (DEMO).typeOfAccountId: 2,
      recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions Automated Clearing House (DEMO).bankRoutingNumber: "112203216",

    ),
    category: recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions (DEMO)(
      recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions (DEMO).friendlyId:ri!friendlyId,
      recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions (DEMO).amountExpectedToPay: 10000,
      recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions (DEMO).merchantName: "Tech Supply Co.",
      recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions (DEMO).transactionAmount: 10000,
      recordType!CMGT Fraudulent Transactions (DEMO).transactionDate: rule!CMGT_EXT_UTIL_RandomDateTime(
        fromDate: a!subtractDateTime(startDateTime: now(), months: 2),
        toDate: now()
      )
    )
  ),
  default: null
)
